QuestData.Title: Bombs Away!
QuestData.Description: The Wellson Shipyard is constantly receiving supplies from offshore and we need to put a stop to it. They have setup cannons along the docks for defense but if you can make it to them, we can use them to destroy their supply ships.$B$BHead down there and see what you can do. Report back to me on your progress.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you take out the boats?
QuestData.RewardText: Great work on those supply ships, $n! We knew you would be good for somethin' around here.
